Class RecipientLine<T>

  • java.lang.Object

    All Implemented Interfaces:
    interfaces.RecipientLineInterface

    public class RecipientLine<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements interfaces.RecipientLineInterface
    Data Structure class that deals with generic queue of Recipient

    Nick Baer
